abstract: You've been invited to a masquerade party hosted by Eric Berlin. Please don't forget to RSVP.
snippet: You've been invited to a masquerade party hosted by Eric Berlin. Please don't forget to RSVP.
lead_paragraph: SUNDAY'S PUZZLE - After reading the Notepad for this puzzle, I jumped to what turned out to be a false conclusion. I assumed (and you should never assume) that I would find this puzzle frustrating. First, you have to figure out the theme clues and their corresponding entries, which are not necessarily "in the language." Then you have to "unmask" the hidden celebrities in each entry. O.K., so I was wrong.
